name: Anitha Uwimpuhwe
title: A Software Engineer and a cybersecurity enthusiast
about: I’m a Software Engineer specialized in fullstack webdevelopment/ Mobile app development with a strong passion for cybersecurity, holding an (ISC)² Cybersecurity Certification. I love building secure, efficient software and enjoy problem-solving in coding and security. My goal is to merge development with cybersecurity best practices to create resilient systems.
